attributes.action: Open the country, stop running from a virus.
attributes.additional_details:
Give us the facts about this virus.  Be truthful in the number of people that have died from the virus and not attribute all deaths where they had the virus but died of other causes.  
Allow the virus to die out naturally.  
Put us in another lockdown will not work.  People will just ignore you. We have had enough.
attributes.background: Look objectively at the situation.  The Governments  of this country and the media has caused this.  Panic and fear.  The virus is holding on because of all the ‘safety’ measures in place.  Return us to normal, protect the vulnerable, let Mother Nature do her job!
